title: maamayoorameedilEri
sahitya:
mAmayUramIdilEri vA ennai rakSikka 



(mA)







anupallavi







kAmitArtha phala dAyaka suravara svAminAtha marakata shaila



shatruca 



(mA)







caraNam 1







nAradAdiyOrgal ishai pADa arambai mAdar ArulAvu nEril naTamADa



marai munivar



shIrinAshi mozhi kUra nIpamurudArulAvu bhuya mEruvODilagu



(mA)







caraNam 2







pAsha bhavamenu-mOsha valai tanaiye kaDandunadu



padamalariNaiye tudi sheidunaiye paNiyumAna



dAshayu-magizh puri pUjaiyum dinam dinamE sheyum padiyaruL



nEshamudan udava 



(mA)







caraNam 3







gatikku-maDiyavar tudikka vaLar shIlA-chidambara



bhAratikkiniya varamadikka varuL vElA dinam-



dinamum adirkkumiDam ena udikku-mayil malaiyadirkkulaviya



vanidikku magizhpuri 



(mA)
